description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nGlaive of Justice:
After this creature {ACTION_attacks}, it deals damage to a random enemy equal to 35% of the attack's damage and has a 50% chance to {ACTION_cast} [icons,1972] Holy Smite. This effect repeats once for each {RACE_Hunter} fighting on your side.
name: Heretic Glaive
